Since its founding in 1830, the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints has insisted that it alone represents true Christianity and that all other churches professing the name of Christ are part of a "Great Apostasy," that has incorporated corrupt doctrine and practices.

This DVD has been produced using LDS Church documents, Joseph Smith's teachings and other historical documents.


Search For The Truth:
Jesus Christ / Joseph Smith has been produced using LDS Church documents, Joseph Smith's teachings and other historical documents. This is the video that LDS leaders do not want you to see.

These were uploaded with explicit permission from GoodNewsForLDS.com. 


This DVD lovingly compares the teachings of Jesus Christ with Joseph Smith's teachings and biblical doctrine with LDS doctrine.

This DVD has made headlines all over the US and Canada.
